meanings.definition: (adjective) having the most lively and stylish qualities
meanings.sent1: The band played the jazziest music at the party.
meanings.sent2: She wore the jazziest outfit to the event.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted around like the jazziest feline in town.
meanings.sent4: His car was the jazziest on the block, shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The jazziest dancer on stage captivated the audience with their moves.

meanings.definition: (adverb) in a manner that is the most lively and stylish
meanings.sent1: She danced jazziest of all at the recital.
meanings.sent2: The singer performed jazziest during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooked jazziest when preparing the special dish.
meanings.sent4: The fashion designer dressed jazziest at the fashion show.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted jazziest, using vibrant colors and bold strokes.
